page.title: 03Housing 1
page.content: {Age. The oldest houses in the villages date from 1700's and there are ap- proximately four of them of this age. The two villages have not grown much in the last decade because only ten houses have been built in that time. Most were built 10-30 years ago.Here is a breakdown of age/number of houses {Age Range No. of Houses } 0-10 10 10-30 24 30-50 15 50-100 16 100-200 16 over 200 4 Of the houses 83% are privately owned and the rest rented either from the Council or employers. Further imformation on housing can be found on page 4.
